channel.title: Comments on: Here is a list of 51 things I wanna do before I croak

item.title: By: Nonayo
item.dc:creator: Nonayo
item.description: aw man, I just re-found this, having forgotten I read it, and thought "I call being one of the five chicks that isn't totally hot!" then discovered I already wrote it, and Will wrote back and said that thing he said. DEJA VU, also YEA!
item.content:encoded: aw man, I just re-found this, having forgotten I read it, and thought “I call being one of the five chicks that isn’t totally hot!” then discovered I already wrote it, and Will wrote back and said that thing he said. DEJA VU, also YEA!

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Lord yes. That is ever so true. I miss you already, but I am sure where ever you wind up landing will be better when you get there. I can tell because things just aren't the same around here since you left us. Happy trails and good luck with your list. I hope you cross a lot of them off but never all of them, we always need to have a few left to aim for or else no more fun. Holler at Annie in aus for me. love w
item.content:encoded:
Lord yes. That is ever so true.
I miss you already, but I am sure where ever you wind up landing will be better when you get there. I can tell because things just aren’t the same around here since you left us. Happy trails and good luck with your list. I hope you cross a lot of them off but never all of them, we always need to have a few left to aim for or else no more fun. Holler at Annie in aus for me.
love
w

item.title: By: brenda
item.dc:creator: brenda
item.description:
Actually it was top 47. Not 43. Not 51. but the number is not important. what is important is to think about what's important to you and write it down. look it over every now and again, share it with friends - who will then pretend it was their fabulous idea (I forget who I stole this idea from, my friend jenny I think).
I always feel that I'm making the most of my life when I see that I'm working towards or actually done something on my list. Think big, dream crazy dreams and above all have a fucking kick ass time!
item.content:encoded:
Actually it was top 47. Not 43. Not 51. but the number is not important. what is important is to think about what’s important to you and write it down. look it over every now and again, share it with friends – who will then pretend it was their fabulous idea (I forget who I stole this idea from, my friend jenny I think).

I always feel that I’m making the most of my life when I see that I’m working towards or actually done something on my list. Think big, dream crazy dreams and above all have a fucking kick ass time!

item.title: By: Marcus

item.content:encoded: LOL! Do it! Do it! Do it! Chug! Chug! Chug!

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: I have spent quite a bit of time trying to figure the logistics of 51, but it can and must happen. Get on that list and let me see it. I will put it up here.
item.content:encoded: I have spent quite a bit of time trying to figure the logistics of 51, but it can and must happen. Get on that list and let me see it. I will put it up here.

item.title: By: Anna
item.dc:creator: Anna
item.description: Hi Willy! I absolutely love this list and you can't count, you have 51 things and not 50! If we were holding our breaths under water I would be much better and beat you but I'm not very good on land! I'm sitting at school reading your list and giggling like an idiot cos I think everythign you have on your list is amazing and I hope you're achieving! I do feel a bit guilty though as it was Brenda who told me to write a top 43 and then I just passed that on to you! But I love your list. I need to get cracking on mine. When I do, I'll send it to you asap. I'd like more info about the logistics of number 51 please.... Talk to you soon Willy and see you soon in Indo town!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Willy!
I absolutely love this list and you can’t count, you have 51 things and not 50! If we were holding our breaths under water I would be much better and beat you but I’m not very good on land! I’m sitting at school reading your list and giggling like an idiot cos I think everythign you have on your list is amazing and I hope you’re achieving! I do feel a bit guilty though as it was Brenda who told me to write a top 43 and then I just passed that on to you! But I love your list. I need to get cracking on mine. When I do, I’ll send it to you asap. I’d like more info about the logistics of number 51 please…. Talk to you soon Willy and see you soon in Indo town!!
